text: ihaloka jivanada udaharaneyu higide; navu akasadinda nirannu surisidevu. Adarinda, manavaru mattu januvarugalu tinnuvantaha bhumiya vividha belegalu beledavu. Konege, bhumiyu tanna sahaja abharanagalondige sampannavagi, alankrtavadaga, bhu malakarugalu, adu sampurnavagi tam'ma niyantranadallide endu bhavisidaru. Agale, ratri athava hagalalli nam'ma adesa bandu bittitu mattu navu, alli ninne enu irale illavembante adannu dhvansagolisibittevu. I riti navu nam'ma drstantagalannu vivarisutteve â€“ cintisuvavarigagi
